title: Serif font id
content:
Can anyone help identify this font and where I can find it ? Thanks

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [font id.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023135604/http:/typophile.com/files/font%20id_3.jpg) | 19.35 KB |
author: creativeliz

comments.content: Very close to **[Corporate A (Bold)](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023135604/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=URW&ffam=Corporate%20A%20-%20Regular&fid=8cd9accb5ae8738244cc2b1b1eb10ea5&fstyle=b&fsize=60&text=Lower&wrap=2)** by URW++
